name: Spiritground Protector
rules:
bushido 4
Whenever one or more enchantments leaves the battlefield, attach target Equipment to target creature with toughness 6 or more. (Control of that Equipment doesn't change.)
When ~this~ leaves the battlefield, ~this~ deals 7 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. When a creature damaged this way is put into a graveyard from the battlefield this turn, return it to the battlefield under your control
Whenever ~this~ deals combat damage to a creature, ~this~ deals 5 damage to each attacking or blocking creature and tap that creature
